channel.title: [667] Use item to get exp
channel.description:
I'm looking for a way if you like say Read a scroll, the scroll breaks and you will get exp in a certain stat, I don't want an interface to let you pick a stat, just designed to go into One stat.
Say Read Scroll Message: Scroll breaks in your hands, but you feel power enter into you! Gives xp in Strength
Im not sure where to find the .java file to attempt to do this, but it would be very helpful if someone can appoint me in the right direction please!

item.title: [667] Use item to get exp

totally just skipped what i said, he doesnt need help with it anymore i doo what file do the codes belong in??

Read full topic

item.title: [667] Use item to get exp
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“Doobage, post:7, topic:451869”]I fixed it

    if (itemId == 1505) {
            player.getSkills().addXp(4, 50000);
            player.getInventory().deleteItem(1505, 1);
            player.sendMessage("<692E15>The magic of the scroll destroys the scroll and fills your body with magic power!");
	    return;
   	}

That does range tho not mage, gotta play around with it for mage. ty all for the help![/quote]

Skill id’s: 0 attack, 1 defense, 2 strength, 3 HP, 4 Range, 5 Pray, 6 Mage … 23 summoning 24 dungeoneering. (unless I got mage and Prayer mixed up… xD if so I’m terribly sorry, and deserve 25-30 lashes, master.)

Read full topic

Edited

sorry the old coded thing was broken ill try this new one.

[quote=“The Soul, post:4, topic:451869”] if (itemId == 1505) { for (int skill = 4; skill < 4; skill++) { player.getSkills().addXp(skill, 50000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(1505, 1); player.sendMessage("<692E15>The magic of the scroll destroys the scroll and fills your body with magic power!"); } return; }

Unless you want it to randomly determine a stat for you?[/quote]

This code did break it, the item wont do nothing now.

Nah just want it to be mage

item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Thnx but i got it SOMEWHAt worked out, only thing i have an issue on is adding EXP to the item, it breaks and says message but no exp.

Here is my code:

        if (itemId == 1505) {
					for (int skill = 4; skill < 4; skill++)
						player.getSkills().addXp(skill, 50000);
           					player.getInventory().deleteItem(1505, 1);
		player.sendMessage("<692E15>The magic of the scroll destroys the scroll and fills your body with magic power!");
            return;
        }
